General.Name: Contextlogic Inc
General.Description: ContextLogic Inc. does not have significant operations. It focuses on identifying, evaluating, and executing strategic opportunities. Previously, it was engaged in the marketplace and logistics business operations. ContextLogic Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Oakland, California.
